channel.title: Help chaning lots of things
channel.description:
omg i got a couple of questons. before u answare u must telll me wht florder to look in and wut to find and then were to place the coode or change it. here they are. I am usin silab server
1. how do u change max combat? (done thanks) 2. how do u do pickup in the silab server?(done thanks) 3. make a ::rich command to get admins max money 4. change prices in shops. (done thanks) 5. make certain items admin only. 6. add a rc alter to make runes. 7. change mage spells so they require the exact number of runes. oo well tht's all if u can help me thanks :)[br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2007, 09:53:35 AM[/size][hr]still need help :)

item.title: Help chaning lots of things
item.dc:creator: @Darque_Star Darque Star
item.description:
@Darque_Star wrote:

well actually, this is the code i used to define the case for runecrafting (it includes the graphic AND animation, i like it the most)

case 2478: // Credit To Darque Star and PlayerManny2 if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You Craft Runes !"); actionTimer = 35; setAnimation(791); playerGfx(186, 0); addSkillXP((1500*playerLevel[20]), 20); addItem(561, 50); addItem(562, 50); addItem(563, 50); addItem(564, 50); addItem(565, 50); addItem(566, 50); addItem(554, 50); addItem(555, 50); addItem(556, 50); addItem(557, 50); addItem(558, 50); addItem(559, 50); addItem(560, 50); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Help chaning lots of things
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

for runecrafting
case 2478:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You Craft Runes !”);
actionTimer = 85;
setAnimation(2555);
addSkillXP((1500*playerLevel[20]), 20);
addItem(runeid, amount);
addItem(runeid, amount);
addItem(runeid, amount);
addItem(runeid, amount);
addItem(runeid, amount);
addItem(runeid, amount);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

item.title: Help chaning lots of things
item.dc:creator: @Darque_Star Darque Star
item.description:
@Darque_Star wrote:

to change the price of an item you go into ITEM.CFG and find your ITEM (you can just do CTRL + F and put the item name in the text box) and then, change the SECOND number item = 3140 Dragon_chainbody A_series_of_connected_metal_rings. 148195.415050151 (THIS ONE)148195.415050151(THIS ONE) 198945.35621087 0 0 0 -15 0 81 93 98 -3 82 0 0
and change it to whatever amount you want it to be…

item.title: Help chaning lots of things
item.dc:creator: @Helbound Helbound
item.description:
@Helbound wrote:

Changing max combat-
Step 1
Search for-

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

The coding around it should look something like this-

[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 99;[/code]

Step 2

Now look for-

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {

In the coding you searched for in step 1.
See the “lvl <= 99;”? Change the “99” in-

lvl <= 99;

of

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {

To the max combat you wish your server to have.

Step 3
Now look for the-

return lvl;

Underneath it should be to breakers ( } )-

} }
Beneath the last breaker should be this-

return 99;

Change the “99” in-

return 99;

To the same number as you chose for step 2.
And…
WAHLA! Your done.
If you need anymore help, PM me.

Read full topic
